summary: Comprehensive testing of WineStudy region detail page with terroir, climate, and PT/EN translation support. All 78 regions from 13 countries verified with complete terroir and climate data. Backend APIs and frontend pages working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/regions returns 78 regions from 13 countries
GET /api/regions/bordeaux returns complete terroir data (soil_pt, soil_en, altitude, maritime_influence)
GET /api/regions/bordeaux returns complete climate data (type_pt, type_en, temperature, rainfall)
GET /api/regions/bordeaux returns PT/EN name translations (Bord√©us/Bordeaux)
GET /api/regions/tuscany returns terroir with Galestro soil
GET /api/regions/tuscany returns Mediterranean climate
GET /api/regions/napa_valley returns volcanic terroir
GET /api/regions/napa_valley returns PT/EN translations (Vale de Napa/Napa Valley)
All 78 regions have terroir.soil_pt, terroir.soil_en, climate.type_pt, climate.type_en
All 78 regions have key_grapes array with at least one grape
GET /api/countries returns 13+ countries
GET /api/countries?world_type=old_world filters correctly
GET /api/regions?country_id=france returns 11 French regions
Region detail page (/atlas/region/bordeaux) displays terroir section
Region detail page displays climate section with type, temperature, rainfall
Region detail page displays main grapes sidebar
Language toggle switches between PT and EN correctly
PT mode shows: Clima, Tipo de Solo, Castas Principais, Estilos de Vinho
EN mode shows: Climate, Soil Type, Main Grapes, Wine Styles
Atlas page shows Old World and New World sections
Atlas page filter buttons (Todos, Velho Mundo, Novo Mundo) work correctly
Navigation from Atlas to Country to Region works correctly
seed_data_creation: 78 regions from 13 countries seeded with complete terroir and climate data in PT/EN
context_for_next_testing_agent: Region detail page fully functional with terroir (soil, altitude, maritime influence) and climate (type, temperature, rainfall) data. All fields support PT/EN translations. 78 regions from 13 countries: France (11), Italy (12), Spain (12), Germany (7), Australia (7), Portugal (6), Chile (5), USA (5), Argentina (3), Austria (3), New Zealand (3), South Africa (3), Uruguay (1). Test file updated with TestRegionDetailAPI class for regression testing.
